title: Circuit Breaker
description: Threshold-based and response-time based Circuit Breaker

failureRateThreshold.title: Failure rate threshold
failureRateThreshold.description: Failure (status code >= 500) rate threshold before the circuit breaker switches to the open state.

slowCallRateThreshold.title: Slow call rate threshold
slowCallRateThreshold.description: Slow call (response-time > slowCallDurationThreshold) rate threshold before the circuit breaker switches to the open state.

slowCallDurationThreshold.title: Slow call duration threshold (in millis)
slowCallDurationThreshold.description: The duration threshold above which calls are considered as slow and increase the slow calls percentage.

windowSize.title: Sliding windows size
windowSize.description: The size of the sliding window which is used to record the outcome of calls when the circuit breaker is closed.

waitDurationInOpenState.title: Wait duration in open state (in millis)
waitDurationInOpenState.description: A fixed wait duration which controls how long the circuit breaker should stay open, before it switches to half open.

redirectToURL.title: Redirect call to URL
redirectToURL.description: Redirect the call to the given URL instead of returning a '503 Service Unavailable' status (supports EL).
